title: Login Error
body:
I had to restore my computer to factory settings yesterday and that meant reinstalling LoL today and now I can't login, I just keep getting did not receive a response from server, retrying attempt 1,2,3,4 and then login error.
I've already installed all the updates and have set my DNS to 8.8.8.8 and 8.8.4.4 like the player support says.
